content: I'll definitely check those out. I've been enjoying experimenting with different clays and materials in my classes, and I'm excited to learn more about combining them to create unique textures. Speaking of classes, I've been taking sculpting classes at the local art studio about three months ago, and it's been a great experience. My instructor, Rachel, has been teaching me the basics of working with clay, and I've gotten pretty comfortable with the feel of it in my hands.
